entry.title: Thursday: Freezing rain or rain. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets and rain changing to rain this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 1:55 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 1:55 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
